summary.span: 表示提供滚动条的控件，该滚动条具有一个滑动 ，其位置对应于一个值。

span.span: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding whose position corresponds to a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示控件。The following illustration shows a control. ![Scrollbar 图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar 图")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") 控件包含控件。The control contains a control. 控件组成控件和两个控件。The control consists of a control and two controls. 可以增加和减少的属性通过按控件控制或通过移动。You can increase and decrease the property of the control by pressing the controls or by moving the . 值的默认范围属性是从 0 到 1。The default range of values for the property is from 0 to 1. 表示的直线距离的终结点之间。The represents the linear distance of the between the endpoints of the . 您可以通过设置更改值的默认范围和属性。You can change the default range of values by setting the and properties. 属性确定是否水平还是垂直显示，必须定义此属性对于控件显示。The property determines whether the is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the control to appear. 中正确，因此值增加从上到下的垂直方向或从左到右对于水平。The in a is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical or from left to right for a horizontal . 相应的绑定目标是下表中的属性属性时属性未显式定义。The properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding properties when the property is not explicitly defined. 如果显式定义属性，该绑定不出现。If you explicitly define the property, the binding does not occur. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 您可以访问控制控件中的使用属性。You can access the control of a control by using the property. 若要显示具有滚动条的内容的框中，使用控件。To display content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the control. ## 自定义滚动条控件Customizing the ScrollBar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ScrollBar 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建水平，其值介于 0 和 100 之间的范围。The following example shows how to create a horizontal that has a range of values between 0 and 100. [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#ScrollBar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#scrollbar)]

summary.span: 通知 用户将水平 的 拖动到 中所提供值的命令。

span.span: The command that notifies the that the user is dragging the of the horizontal to the value that is provided in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户拖动的 thumb ，则调用为。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果将返回`true`，则执行该命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果将返回`false`，则执行。If returns `false`, the executes the . 使用此命令将启用延迟滚动。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 时是`true`并在用户拖动的，则内容不会更改直到用户释放。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果启用了延迟滚动执行对于水平当用户拖动。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a horizontal when the user drags the .

span.span: The command that notifies the that the user is dragging the of the vertical to the value that is provided in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户拖动的 thumb ，则调用为。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果将返回`true`，则执行该命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果将返回`false`，则执行。If returns `false`, the executes the . 使用此命令将启用延迟滚动。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 时是`true`并在用户拖动的，则内容不会更改直到用户释放。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果启用了延迟滚动执行对于垂直当用户拖动。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a vertical when the user drags the .

summary.span: 获取 控件的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型样式模板控件包括括在任何一侧两个控件控件。A typical style template for a control includes a control that is surrounded on either side by two controls. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问与一起使用的控件控件。The following example shows how to access the control that is used with a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#track)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#track)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ViewportSize : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前可见的可滚动内容的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.

value.span: 当前可见的可滚动内容的量。

span.span: The amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用的单位用于描述内容的长度的单位相同。The units that are used for are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content. 一些示例包括的文本行或页的文本。Some examples include lines of text or pages of text. 值属性用于计算的大小控件中的滑动值指示符作为显示控件。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a control. 控件的大小表示的量可见的控件的内容。The control's size represents the amount of a control's content that is visible. 如果 25%控件的内容是可见，请占用中跟踪的 25% 。If 25 percent of a control's content is visible, the occupies 25 percent of the track in the . 您可以决定哪些单位使用。You can decide which units uses. 当设置此属性时，请确保， ， ，和属性使用相同的单位。When you set this property, make sure that the , , , and properties use the same units. 下图显示了大小反映的是可见的内容量。The following illustration shows how the size reflects the amount of content that is visible. ![跟踪长度和滚动条的 thumbsize](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "跟踪长度和滚动条的 thumbsize")![The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置上控件。The following example shows how to set the on a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#viewport)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#viewport)] [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#viewport)]
